010package imagingbook.common.edges;
011
012import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
013
014/**
015 * This is the common interface for all color edge detectors.
016 * 
017 * @author WB
018 * @version 2013/05/30
019 * @version 2022/09/04 converted to interface
020 */
021public interface EdgeDetector {
022        
023        /**
024         * Returns the calculated edge magnitude for each pixel
025         * as a {@link FloatProcessor}.
026         * 
027         * @return the edge magnitude map
028         */
029        public FloatProcessor getEdgeMagnitude();
030        
031        /**
032         * Returns the calculated edge orientation for each pixel
033         * as a {@link FloatProcessor}.
034         * 
035         * @return the edge orientation map
036         */
037        public FloatProcessor getEdgeOrientation();
038        
039}
